attributes.additional_details: Why was the decision on the Lisbon Treaty of 2008 referendum not accepted and why was it repeated in 2009 (16 months later) to get a different decision?
attributes.background: The referendum decision was unanimous by over 17 million voters and there is no real reason to delay invoking article 50 other than a repeat of the Lisbon Treaty in Ireland in 2008 when the vote was to reject and then held again in 2009 when the result was accept.
